entry.source: The details are just as I explained a moment ago.{F801}You must {F804,5}find Navarre, who has gone missing in{F801}Naraku.{F804,0} He must be petrified with isolation and{F801}fear in that place where demons roam... You must{F801}find him at once!{F801}
